title: Kitty sessions not updating console properly.
author: mgaulton
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
Windows in background update properly, command output shows without enter pressed
Worked fully in previous versions. This is the first time i've encountered this.

## Current Behavior
Windows in background do not update properly, contents of commands don't show until enter is hit, bottom of session has outdated lines below the prompt. clear resets it for a while.
